title: Djokovic unsure if he’ll be fit enough to beat Alcaraz in US Open semi-finals
summary: Serbian tennis player has reached the semi-finals in all four Grand Slam tournaments this year. However, he has faced physical challenges in the later stages of each major event. Despite his consistent performance, his endurance has been a concern.

title: House Republicans approve new panel to ‘uncover all the facts’ of January 6 attack
summary: Democrats are criticizing the establishment of a new subcommittee, claiming it aims to alter the narrative surrounding the Capitol riots. They assert that the committee's purpose is to shift responsibility away from former President Donald Trump. This move has sparked significant political controversy and disagreement among party lines.

title: US Open tennis 2025: Anisimova shocks Swiatek, Auger-Aliassime beats De Minaur on day 11 – live
summary: Felix Auger-Aliassime defeated Alex de Minaur in his match, securing a spot in the semi-finals. Meanwhile, Amanda Anisimova avenged her previous Wimbledon loss to Iga Swiatek, also advancing to the semi-finals. Both players showcased impressive performances to reach this stage of the tournament.

title: Judge sides with Harvard and orders Trump to reverse billions in funding cuts – US politics live
summary: A federal judge in Boston has mandated the reversal of the Biden administration's cuts to over $2.6 billion in research grant funding. This decision reinstates financial support for various research initiatives affected by the cuts. The ruling highlights ongoing legal battles regarding federal funding allocations.
